name: Synverse
tag_list: managed-services, wlr3, telecom-reseller, web2-0, communication-providers, email-archiving, mobile, saas, open-source, cps, business-process-utility, llu, microsoft, tibco, sap
overview:
Synverse is the next generation global IT services provider driven by innovation and accelerators which are underpinned by industry best practices & methodologies and the key focus is on enterprise integration, customer management, web engineering and collaboration solutions. Synverse differentiates with other market players by virtue of its singular business, solution and technology accelerator frameworks. This enables our customers with aggressive time-to-market & lower total cost of ownership, without compromising on the service and delivery quality, thereby providing the business with ammunition in order to gain the competitive edge, improve customer service & achieve operational efficiencies thus increasing their revenue & market share.

Our unique combination of solution frameworks, methodologies & our workforce takes our customers global delivery of IT solutions to culmination. The customers not only benefit from our methodology tailored for various IT projects but can also leverage our core frameworks which are across industry verticals and technologies resulting in cost reduction, implementing industry best practice and faster time to market.
